event_description:
Leadership fundamentals guide you to understand different leadership styles, build your personal leadership brand, and develop your emotional intelligence.
Effective communication strategies such as mastering active listening, improving your verbal and written communication, and learning how to give and receive constructive feedback are covered.
Building high-performing teams involves discovering techniques for fostering collaboration, resolving conflict, and creating a positive and productive team environment.
Public speaking and presentation skills development helps you gain confidence in presenting your ideas, engaging your audience, and delivering impactful presentations.
This workshop is ideal for individuals seeking to enhance their leadership and communication skills, professionals looking to advance their careers and take on leadership roles, and managers and team leaders seeking to improve their team's performance and collaboration.
Come and celebrate Hari Raya Vibes

Get ready for a night of cinematic magic under the stars (or indoors, depending on the weather)! Join us for a cozy and fun-filled Movie Night, where we'll be enjoying a captivating film, delicious snacks, and great company.
What to Expect:
Feature Film: We'll be screening Home Alone 2, a funny film that promises hilarious misadventures in New York City. Get ready for plenty of slapstick comedy and heartwarming family moments.
Delicious Treats: Indulge in a variety of tasty snacks, including popcorn, candy, pizza, and cookies. Feel free to bring your own favorite treats to share!
Good Company: Relax, unwind, and enjoy the movie with friends and fellow film enthusiasts. It's the perfect opportunity to catch up, laugh, and create lasting memories.

This workshop is designed to help you conquer your fear of public speaking and become a confident and engaging communicator. You'll learn practical techniques and strategies to improve your delivery, captivate your audience, and leave a lasting impression.
Key Takeaways:
Master the fundamentals of public speaking: Understand the elements of effective communication, including voice projection, body language, and audience engagement.
Develop your stage presence: Learn how to project confidence, overcome nerves, and command attention.
Craft compelling presentations: Develop a clear structure for your speeches, write engaging content, and use visual aids effectively.
Practice and refine your skills: Participate in interactive exercises and receive personalized feedback to enhance your delivery.
This workshop is ideal for:
Individuals who want to overcome their fear of public speaking.
Professionals who need to present confidently in meetings, conferences, or sales pitches.
Anyone who wants to improve their communication skills and become a more effective speaker.
By the end of this workshop, you will be able to:
Deliver clear, concise, and engaging presentations.
Connect with your audience and build rapport.
Use your voice and body language effectively.
Handle Q&A sessions with confidence.
Craft compelling speeches that leave a lasting impact.
Join us for this empowering workshop and unlock your potential as a confident and effective public speaker!

Zootopia (titled Zootropolis or Zoomania in various regions) is an American animated buddy cop comedy film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios. Directed by Byron Howard and Rich Moore from a screenplay by Jared Bush and Phil Johnston, the film stars the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate, Nate Torrence, Bonnie Hunt, Don Lake, Tommy Chong, J. K. Simmons, Octavia Spencer, Alan Tudyk, and Shakira. Its plot follows a rookie police officer rabbit and a con artist fox as they work together to uncover a conspiracy involving the disappearance of predators.

Embark on a journey of discovery and immerse yourself in the vibrant tapestry of Turkish culture!
This captivating event will transport you to the heart of Turkey, where you'll experience its rich history, traditions, and warm hospitality. Get ready to:
Savor authentic Turkish cuisine: Indulge in a delectable feast of traditional dishes, from savory kebabs to sweet baklava, prepared by renowned chefs.
Explore the wonders of Istanbul: Discover the iconic Hagia Sophia, the magnificent Blue Mosque, and the bustling Grand Bazaar.
Experience the vibrant art scene: Immerse yourself in the world of Turkish calligraphy, ceramics, and textiles, and witness the artistry of local artisans.
Learn the graceful rhythms of Turkish dance: Join a workshop and learn the mesmerizing steps of traditional dances like the "Halay" and the "Horon."
Engage in lively conversation: Connect with local Turkish speakers and practice your language skills in a friendly and supportive environment.
This event is perfect for:
Travelers seeking an authentic cultural experience.
Food enthusiasts eager to explore new flavors.
History buffs fascinated by the Ottoman Empire.
Art lovers seeking inspiration in diverse artistic traditions.
Language learners wanting to practice their Turkish skills.
